columns.name: rate_code
columns.description: A unique code for a product/ offer/ pricing-tier combination.

columns.name: service_code
columns.description: This identifies the specific AWS service to the customer as a unique short abbreviation.

columns.name: term
columns.description: Whether your AWS usage is Reserved or On-Demand.

columns.name: purchase_option
columns.description: How you chose to pay for this line item (All Upfront, Partial Upfront, No Upfront).

columns.name: lease_contract_length
columns.description: The length of time that your RI is reserved for.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description for a product / offer / pricing-tier combination.

columns.name: begin_range
columns.description: Start of billing range, by unit

columns.name: end_range
columns.description: Enf of billing range, by unit

columns.name: unit
columns.description: The pricing unit that AWS used for calculating your usage cost (ex: hours)

columns.name: publication_date
columns.description: The publication date of the offer.

columns.name: effective_date
columns.description: The effective date of the pricing details.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The publication version of the offer.
